issue.title: Unable to deselect a perimeter (using wms+wfs perimeters) in SHOP
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When using a custom perimeter in SHOP (with a wms+wfs couple):
- I can add multiple perimeters using CTRL key
- Then if I want to deselect just one item (and not clear the entire selection), i can't (or didn't fount the way to...)

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This one has been done with #943.
No code to merge. Target is 4.3.2 .
